author: crossley
msg: This workaround is not needed anymore.

author: coliver
msg: Attempt to give meaningful error information when generated xml document is invalid

author: stefano
msg: added the ability to send a redirect to the browser directly from the flowscript. You could do this before since you had direct access to the Environment, but it makes it more evident if it's added directly to the FOM. Note that the method doesn't create sessions, you have to do it by hand if you really need one. The method is inherently stateless.
